Metadata.title: Wilson Bravo - Fullstack Web Developer | Portfolio & Projects
Metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Wilson Bravo, a fullstack web developer. Explore my experience, featured projects, a working backend demo, and a brief biography. Delivering modern, customized web solutions.

HomePage.title: Hello world!

born-city.title: Born in Pasto
born-city.paragraph: I was born in Pasto, Nariño, and my academic and professional journey has been marked by a strong background in electronic engineering. Initially, I acquired knowledge in electrical installations and basic electronics during my education at a technical school.

university.title: University
university.paragraph:
Later on, I decided to broaden my academic horizons and graduated in Electronic Engineering from the Pontifical Javeriana University.

During my time at university, I delved into the fundamentals of engineering, applied physics, and microcontroller programming.

programming.title: Programming
programming.paragraph:
Additionally, I specialized in areas such as artificial intelligence, Internet of Things (IoT), and image processing and vision, solidifying my interest in technological development.

My dedication was recognized with an honorable mention for my thesis.

wom.title: Internship
wom.paragraph:
I applied my knowledge in a practical setting. My professional internships at WOM (Partners Telecom Colombia) were an invaluable opportunity to put my skills into practice. In diverse projects, from developing a process manager with Tkinter to implementing web applications with Django and creating APIs for automatic queries to Oracle databases, I showcased my proficiency in Python programming.

Throughout this experience, I also gained expertise in handling data from key tools such as Zabbix, Grafana, and AppDynamics, translating into effective solutions.

oracle.title: Web Development
oracle.paragraph:
As part of the Oracle Next Education (ONE) program, I deepened my knowledge in full-stack web development. I worked on building scalable web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Node.js. The program emphasized agile methodologies, teamwork, and clean code practices, reinforcing both my technical and collaborative skills.

I also developed several portfolio projects, showcasing my ability to translate user needs into functional and responsive web solutions.

google.title: Cybersecurity
google.paragraph:
The Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate program equipped me with practical skills in network security, risk management, and threat analysis. I gained hands-on experience with tools like Wireshark, Linux, and SIEM platforms, enabling me to detect vulnerabilities and respond to incidents effectively.

This training strengthened my understanding of security frameworks and best practices, preparing me to contribute to robust and secure digital environments.

HomePage.self-description: I am an Electronics Engineer and Full Stack Developer with experience in data management and problem-solving in software implementation. I am passionate about improving my skills and adding value to every project.

undergraduateThesis.title: Undergraduate Project
undergraduateThesis.description: Web application developed with Django and Python scripts for real-time violence detection. It uses image processing and machine learning techniques to identify risky situations, contributing to social safety and well-being.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Web application developed with NextJS, Material UI, and TypeScript. Showcases my projects, skills, and professional experience, with a modern and responsive design.

lifeSwap.title: Life Swap
lifeSwap.description: Mobile application for exchanging daily routines between users, developed with NestJS and React Native. It allows users to share and adopt routines from others, promoting a healthy and diverse lifestyle.

Admin Dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
Admin Dashboard.description: Aplicación web de administración de datos, desarrollada con NextJS y TypeScript. Permite la gestión eficiente de información, con un enfoque en la usabilidad y la seguridad.

advices.close-window: Click anywhere to close this window.
